import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {deleteWallet} from '../../Actions/ProjectActions' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class WalletPanelBoard extends Component { deleteBtnClick = () =>{ alert(this.props.wallet.id) } render() { const wallet = this.props.wallet return (

{wallet.name}

Account Number: {wallet.accountNumber}

{wallet.description}

Balance

Rs. {wallet.currentBalance}

  • View Transactions
  • Update Account Info
    • this.deleteBtnClick()} >
  • Delete Account
) } } export default connect(null,{})(WalletPanelBoard)
